Package interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.control.diagram

Class DiagramView

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactr.cs.kuleuven.be.ui.control.diagram.DiagramView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DiagramObserver, CommandHandler, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommunicationView, SequenceView

    public abstract class DiagramView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, CommandHandler, DiagramObserver
    An abstract interface for diagram views. Diagram views can display diagrams in a coordinate system. They allow for manipulation and selection of diagram components.

                  throws InvalidLabelException
        Sets whether or not the current selection is in edit mode.
        Parameters:
        isEditing - A flag denoting whether or not edit mode should be activated.
        Throws:
        InvalidLabelException - If the current edit session could not be aborted because the label is invalid.

      • addParty

        public void addParty​(int x,
                     int y)
              throws InvalidAddPartyException
        Creates a new party at the given coordinates in this view's diagram.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the new party.
        y - The y coordinate of the new party.
        Throws:
        InvalidAddPartyException - The given party cannot be added to this diagram view at the given coordinate.

      • moveParty

        public void moveParty​(Party movedParty,
                      int toX,
                      int toY)
               throws NoSuchPartyException,
                      InvalidMovePartyException
        A method that moves the given party to the given coordinates
        Parameters:
        movedParty - The that is to be moved.
        toX - The end x coordinate for the moving session.
        toY - The end y coordinate for the moving session.
        Throws:
        InvalidMovePartyException - If the give party is null.
        InvalidMovePartyException - If the party could not be moved to the given end coordinates.
        NoSuchPartyException

      • addMessage

        public void addMessage​(int fromX,
                       int fromY,
                       int toX,
                       int toY)
        Add a message from the given start to the given end coordinates.
        Parameters:
        fromX - The start x coordinate for the message.
        fromY - The start y coordinate for the message.
        toX - The end x coordinate for the message.
        toY - The end y coordinate for the message.
        Throws:
        InvalidAddMessageException - If a message could not be added.
